Text.Name: BottleNeckChance
Text.Title: Common Limit
Text.Desc: Breakthrough of Common Limit can be initiated simply by choosing a right location, and there will be a chance to succeed.

Text.Name: BottleNeckExplore
Text.Title: Adventure Limit
Text.Desc: Breakthrough of Adventure Limit requires you to send out disciples for Adventures in order to accumulate enough enlightenments.

Text.Name: BottleNeckWork
Text.Title: Vacuum Limit
Text.Desc: In the Vacuum Limit, disciples will lose all of their magic powers and become mortal beings. In order to breakthrough, one needs accumulated enlightenments from everyday trivia.

Text.Name: BottleNeckGold
Text.Title: Golden Core Limit
Text.Desc: Golden Core Limit is a crucial bottleneck to breakthrough. Cultivators must forge the Qi of their whole body into a Golden Core, the tier of which will determine how high a level of cultivation one may achieve in the future.

Text.Name: BottleNeckThunder
Text.Title: Tribulation Limit
Text.Desc: Tribulation Limit is a great trial on the Law of cultivation. Those failed to breakthrough it will lose all their foundation at best, or be utterly obliterated at worst.

Text.Name: BottleNeckGod
Text.Title: Ascend Limit
Text.Desc: Ascend Limit is the final challenge presented before cultivators, who may ascend into immortality at last upon its breakthrough.

Text.Name: BottleNeckGodCity
Text.Title: Divine Realm Limit
Text.Desc: Formation of Divine Realm is the most crucial moment for Shendao cultivators. The state of the Divine Realm will determine the highest level one may achieve in the future.

Text.Name: BottleNeckFuPractice
Text.Title: Natal Talisman
Text.Desc: A type of Limit unique to Talisman cultivators, the breakthrough of which requires one to consume their Qi to draw a Natal Talisman.

Text.Name: BottleNeckDie
Text.Title: Desperation Limit
Text.Desc: This limit signifies that the cultivation has met a dead end.
